meta.title: Summit Hill School District 161 - Frankfort, Illinois

meta.name: KEYWORDS
meta.content: school district 161, frankfort square, arbury hills, hilda walker, dr. julian rogus school, walker school, summit hill jr. high, frankfort Illinois

meta.name: description
meta.content: The mission of Summit Hill District 161, in collaboration with the family and the community, is to provide our students with the highest quality educational opportunities in a safe, supportive,and stimulating learning environment which will empower them to become productive global citizens and successful lifelong learners.

li.a: NWEA MAP Growth & MAP Skills Admin
NWEA MAP Growth & MAP Skills Admin

br.br: All K-12 schools will be closed from Monday, March 16, 2020 through April 30th, 2020. All related activities are cancelled during these dates.

link.script: $('.drag_content').click(function(){});$('.drag_content').bind("mouseenter",function(){$(this).css({"border-top":"1px solid #333","border-bottom":"1px solid #333"});});$(".drag_content").bind("mouseleave",function(){$(this).css({"border-top":"","border-bottom":""});});$(".drag_content").draggable({over:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");},});$(".drag_content").droppable({revert:"invalid",drop:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");var drop_id=$(this).attr("id");$('#from_content_id').val(drag_id);$('#to_content_id').val(drop_id);$('#reorder_content').submit();}});$('.drag_image').bind("mouseenter",function(){});$(".drag_image").bind("mouseleave",function(){});$(".drag_image").draggable({over:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");},});$(".drag_image").droppable({revert:"invalid",drop:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");var drop_id=$(this).attr("id");$('#from_image_id').val(drag_id);$('#to_image_id').val(drop_id);$('#reorder_slider').submit();}});function changepositions(from_pos,to_pos){alert(from_pos+"-"+to_pos);var item=$("#from_id").val(from_pos);var item=$("#to_id").val(to_pos);var item=$("#is_swapping").val("yes");}

div.p: The mission of Summit Hill District 161, in collaboration with the family and the community, is to provide our students with the highest quality educational opportunities in a safe, supportive,and stimulating learning environment which will empower them to become productive global citizens and successful lifelong learners.

April 15 Policy Committee & Regular Board meeting will be available via live video streaming
Board Members will be participating remotely for the April 15 Policy Committee & Board Meeting starting at 6 p.m. For those wishing to attend remotely, the meeting will be streamed live via Livestream for the general public to hear at:https://livestream.com/shsd161/events/9059359 The district logo and splash screen will be displayed. Listeners will be hearing the meeting in real time. Please be aware that, just like live TV broadcast, there is a 5-10 second delay from what is spoken to what is broadcasted.
All public comments can be emailed to the Superintendent at brains@summithill.org. The comments will then be relayed to the Board President during the meeting.
Additionally, the audio of this meeting will be recorded and uploaded to the website.

div.p: Check to see what your student will need for the school year. Supply Lists are listed by school.

div.p: With the launch of our Virtual Backpack, District 161 is introducing an eco-friendly online distribution system that saves resources and time required to sort and handle materials.

div.p: PowerSchool is a Student Information System used by schools across the country. It is capable of allowing parents access to student grades and attendance in real time.

div.p: Review the latest updates, meeting information, presentations regarding the feasibility study.

img.alt: Plow on snow covered road in blizzard conditions
img.title: Plow on snow covered road in blizzard conditions

p.script: $('.drag_content').click(function(){});$('.drag_content').bind("mouseenter",function(){$(this).css({"border-top":"1px solid #333","border-bottom":"1px solid #333"});});$(".drag_content").bind("mouseleave",function(){$(this).css({"border-top":"","border-bottom":""});});$(".drag_content").draggable({over:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");},});$(".drag_content").droppable({revert:"invalid",drop:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");var drop_id=$(this).attr("id");$('#from_content_id').val(drag_id);$('#to_content_id').val(drop_id);$('#reorder_content').submit();}});$('.drag_image').bind("mouseenter",function(){});$(".drag_image").bind("mouseleave",function(){});$(".drag_image").draggable({over:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");},});$(".drag_image").droppable({revert:"invalid",drop:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");var drop_id=$(this).attr("id");$('#from_image_id').val(drag_id);$('#to_image_id').val(drop_id);$('#reorder_slider').submit();}});function changepositions(from_pos,to_pos){alert(from_pos+"-"+to_pos);var item=$("#from_id").val(from_pos);var item=$("#to_id").val(to_pos);var item=$("#is_swapping").val("yes");}

div.p: It never seems soon enough to communicate our plan concerning inclement weather or a school building heating or power emergency. Should the need arise, school closing will be communicated in a variety of ways:

ul.li: Parents automatically receive alerts via text, voice, or e-mail.

p.script: $('.drag_content').click(function(){});$('.drag_content').bind("mouseenter",function(){$(this).css({"border-top":"1px solid #333","border-bottom":"1px solid #333"});});$(".drag_content").bind("mouseleave",function(){$(this).css({"border-top":"","border-bottom":""});});$(".drag_content").draggable({over:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");},});$(".drag_content").droppable({revert:"invalid",drop:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");var drop_id=$(this).attr("id");$('#from_content_id').val(drag_id);$('#to_content_id').val(drop_id);$('#reorder_content').submit();}});$('.drag_image').bind("mouseenter",function(){});$(".drag_image").bind("mouseleave",function(){});$(".drag_image").draggable({over:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");},});$(".drag_image").droppable({revert:"invalid",drop:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");var drop_id=$(this).attr("id");$('#from_image_id').val(drag_id);$('#to_image_id').val(drop_id);$('#reorder_slider').submit();}});function changepositions(from_pos,to_pos){alert(from_pos+"-"+to_pos);var item=$("#from_id").val(from_pos);var item=$("#to_id").val(to_pos);var item=$("#is_swapping").val("yes");}

ul.li: We review wind chill chart from the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA).
If the air temperature reaches -10, we will strongly consider closing school.
If a sustained wind chill of between -25 and -30 is forecast, we will strongly consider closing school.
We will generally make a decision and communicate with parents around 5:30 a.m.
A status update will be provided to parents the evening before.
If schools are closed, all school-related activities are cancelled.

div.p: Summit Hill Educational Foundation creatively generates financial support to enrich the educational experiences of District 161 Students.

div.p: Follow us on Facebook to keep updated with District news, events, photos, and articles of interest for education and parenting in the District.

div.p: The mission of Summit Hill District 161, in collaboration with the family and the community, is to provide our students with the highest quality educational opportunities in a safe, supportive,and stimulating learning environment which will empower them to become productive global citizens and successful lifelong learners.

div.script: $('.drag_content').click(function(){});$('.drag_content').bind("mouseenter",function(){$(this).css({"border-top":"1px solid #333","border-bottom":"1px solid #333"});});$(".drag_content").bind("mouseleave",function(){$(this).css({"border-top":"","border-bottom":""});});$(".drag_content").draggable({over:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");},});$(".drag_content").droppable({revert:"invalid",drop:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");var drop_id=$(this).attr("id");$('#from_content_id').val(drag_id);$('#to_content_id').val(drop_id);$('#reorder_content').submit();}});$('.drag_image').bind("mouseenter",function(){});$(".drag_image").bind("mouseleave",function(){});$(".drag_image").draggable({over:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");},});$(".drag_image").droppable({revert:"invalid",drop:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");var drop_id=$(this).attr("id");$('#from_image_id').val(drag_id);$('#to_image_id').val(drop_id);$('#reorder_slider').submit();}});function changepositions(from_pos,to_pos){alert(from_pos+"-"+to_pos);var item=$("#from_id").val(from_pos);var item=$("#to_id").val(to_pos);var item=$("#is_swapping").val("yes");}

$('.drag_content').click(function(){});$('.drag_content').bind("mouseenter",function(){$(this).css({"border-top":"1px solid #333","border-bottom":"1px solid #333"});});$(".drag_content").bind("mouseleave",function(){$(this).css({"border-top":"","border-bottom":""});});$(".drag_content").draggable({over:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");},});$(".drag_content").droppable({revert:"invalid",drop:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");var drop_id=$(this).attr("id");$('#from_content_id').val(drag_id);$('#to_content_id').val(drop_id);$('#reorder_content').submit();}});$('.drag_image').bind("mouseenter",function(){});$(".drag_image").bind("mouseleave",function(){});$(".drag_image").draggable({over:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");},});$(".drag_image").droppable({revert:"invalid",drop:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");var drop_id=$(this).attr("id");$('#from_image_id').val(drag_id);$('#to_image_id').val(drop_id);$('#reorder_slider').submit();}});function changepositions(from_pos,to_pos){alert(from_pos+"-"+to_pos);var item=$("#from_id").val(from_pos);var item=$("#to_id").val(to_pos);var item=$("#is_swapping").val("yes");}

$('.drag_content').click(function(){});$('.drag_content').bind("mouseenter",function(){$(this).css({"border-top":"1px solid #333","border-bottom":"1px solid #333"});});$(".drag_content").bind("mouseleave",function(){$(this).css({"border-top":"","border-bottom":""});});$(".drag_content").draggable({over:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");},});$(".drag_content").droppable({revert:"invalid",drop:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");var drop_id=$(this).attr("id");$('#from_content_id').val(drag_id);$('#to_content_id').val(drop_id);$('#reorder_content').submit();}});$('.drag_image').bind("mouseenter",function(){});$(".drag_image").bind("mouseleave",function(){});$(".drag_image").draggable({over:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");},});$(".drag_image").droppable({revert:"invalid",drop:function(event,ui){var drag_id=$(ui.draggable).attr("id");var drop_id=$(this).attr("id");$('#from_image_id').val(drag_id);$('#to_image_id').val(drop_id);$('#reorder_slider').submit();}});function changepositions(from_pos,to_pos){alert(from_pos+"-"+to_pos);var item=$("#from_id").val(from_pos);var item=$("#to_id").val(to_pos);var item=$("#is_swapping").val("yes");}
